name: FX Rates

metadata.exclusions: No known exclusions beyond documented table/model constraints.
metadata.confidence_notes: Validated against seeded demo dataset; verify against production policies before external reporting.

business_purpose: Daily FX reference rates for converting balances and payments across currencies.

key_columns.name: rate
key_columns.business_meaning: Conversion rate from base to quote

common_queries: SELECT rate_date, base_currency, quote_currency, rate FROM bank_fx_rates ORDER BY rate_date
gotchas: Use rate_date aligned to business_date for historical conversions
